data.title: A Two-day Virtual Workshop on Develop, Deliver and Assess Online Courses with MOODLE Learning Management System
speakers: Prof. D V L N Somayajulu, Director, Indian Institute of Information Technology, Design and Manufacturing Kurnool
Prof. NARASIMHA SARMA N V S, , Director, Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli
Dr. Anoop Jacob Thomas, Assistant Professor, Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli
Dr. Dr. N. Renugadevi, Assistant Professor, Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli
Dr. M V Durga Prasad, Visiting Faculty, Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing, Kurnool
Dr. Eswaramoorthy K V, Assistant Professor, , Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing, Kurnool
topics: Philosophy of Online Learning Management System
feedbacks: The Programme well planned and accomplished by covering all topics as per schedule
The Program was interactive and integrated, includes theoretical session and hands on session
The Programme gave insights and practical exposure about online education, e-content preparation using OER (Open Education Resource) and developing the content by own and delivering the content
Participants encouraged using upon source software to prepare the content and learnt to use MOODLE platform
Various Assessment methods and student engaging methods are explored during the training programme
suggestions: Training Programme can have more time in practical session
